title: [Question]Faculty for BD+DA: Which one to go for?
content: Hey, can seniors tell me about the experience they had with these faculties? I am more concerned about their teaching rather than their experience, so I would love to hear your thoughts about that.

comments.body: Can you like rank them or something? The thing is I dont have a crazy GPA so I would like to know all options

For da: gowri, suresh, sujatha/nagegowda, Jyothi
For bd: Prafullata, suresh/vadiraj, shivagama

Also I've heard a few people say that DA isn't a good combo to handle along with BD unless you get gowri ma'am, how true is that? Should I look to switch from DA to something else during the first week in case I don't get her for DA?
yep gowri is super good, and it's not too easy to manage da without her. da is a useful course though, so it's your call. don't drop bd though it's one of the most useful subjects ever.

Yup I'm definitely taking BD, the toss up will be between AA and DA for me.  
Thanks a lot!
